subject: p14295224
History: W/productive cough, hx of GERD leading to PNA. Evaluate for pneumonia.
Findings: No significant interval change. The lungs remain hyperinflated. No focal consolidation, edema, or pneumothorax. Bilateral pleural effusions are small. The heart is normal in size. Retrocardiac opacity on the right is consistent with neo esophagus. No acute osseous abnormality.
Impression: Small bilateral pleural effusions are unchanged. No evidence of pneumonia.
